channel.title: I want right klick stats instead of follow
channel.description:
i want right klick ''stats'' instead of ''follow''
but could someone tell me how to change ? and what to add, so if i click on a player with right mouse klick and i choose stats that there pop ups a menu with the stats from the chosen player..
